alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MALHEUR COUNTY AND HARNEY COUNTY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one quarter mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 959 AM PST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Idlewild Campground to near Frenchglen and moving east at 45 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Narrows, Frenchglen, Idlewild Campground, and Krumbo Lake around 1000 AM PST. Moon Hill, Diamond, Barton Lake, and Diamond Craters around 1010 AM PST. New Princeton, Crane, Stinkingwater Pass, and Buchanan around 1020 AM PST. Drewsey, Riddle Mountain, Bartlett Mountain, and Circle Bar around 1030 AM PST. Drinkwater Pass and Warm Springs Reservoir around 1040 AM PST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
